title: Stokes wants to remain captain despite Ashes defeat
subtitle: England captain Ben Stokes says he "absolutely" has the energy to still lead the side after defeat by Australia in the third Test in Adelaide meant they lost the Ashes at the earliest opportunity.
full_text: England captain Ben Stokes says he "absolutely" has the energy to still lead the side after defeat by Australia in the third Test in Adelaide meant they lost the Ashes at the earliest opportunity.
